meaning list.sentence translation: Pargîdanî ji ber polîtîkayên xwe rastî rexneyên tund hat.

meaning list.sentence: They tried to cover up the scandal, but the truth came out.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hewl dan vê skandalê veşêrin lê rastî derket holê.

meaning list.sentence: You should cover up; it’s really cold outside.
meaning list.sentence translation: Divê hûn veşêrin; Li derve bi rastî sar e.

meaning list.sentence: The village was cut off from the rest of the world during the flood.
meaning list.sentence translation: Di dema lehiyê de gund ji dinyayê qut bû.

meaning list.sentence: We’ll have to do without a car until it gets repaired.
meaning list.sentence translation: Heta ku bê tamîrkirin em ê neçar bimînin ku bê otomobîl bi rêve bibin.

meaning list.sentence: The sound of the music gradually faded away.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dengê muzîkê gav bi gav winda bû.

meaning list.sentence: The troops were ordered to fall back to a safer position.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ferman hat dayîn ku leşker paşde vekişin cihekî ewle.

meaning list.sentence: He fell for her the moment he saw her.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dema ku wî dît, ew evîndar bû.

meaning list.sentence: She fell for his lies again.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ew dîsa ket ber derewên wê.

meaning list.meaning: xwe parastin, li ber xwe dan
meaning list.sentence: She fought back when the attacker tried to grab her bag.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dema ku êrîşkar xwest çenteyê wê bigire, wê li ber xwe da.

meaning list.sentence: He fought back tears during the emotional speech.
meaning list.sentence translation: Wî di dema axaftina hestyarî de hêsirên xwe xwar kir.

meaning list.sentence: He fired up the engine and drove away.
meaning list.sentence translation: Motorê dest pê kir û çû.

meaning list.sentence: The coach fired up the team before the game.
meaning list.sentence translation: Rahêner beriya maçê tîmê heyecan kir.

meaning list.sentence: He worked hard to get ahead of his competitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ji bo ku pêşî li hevrikên xwe bigire, wî gelek xebitî.

meaning list.sentence: His strength finally gave way under the heavy load.
meaning list.sentence translation: Di bin barê giran de, di dawiyê de hêza wî derket.

meaning list.sentence: You must give way to pedestrians at the crosswalk.
meaning list.sentence translation: Divê hûn rê bidin peyayan li dergehê peyayan.

meaning list.meaning: Hemû hêza xwe bi kar bîne, her tiştî eşkere bike
meaning list.sentence: They went all out to make the wedding perfect.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ji bo ku dawet bêkêmasî çêbibin, her tiştê xwe kirin.

meaning list.meaning: her tim behsa heman tiştî dikin
meaning list.sentence: He keeps going on about his new car.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ew bi berdewamî behsa otomobîla xwe ya nû dike.

meaning list.sentence: The soldiers held out for two days before surrendering.
meaning list.sentence translation: Leşkeran beriya ku teslîm bibin 2 rojan li ber xwe dan.

meaning list.sentence: She held out her hand to greet him.
meaning list.sentence translation: Destê xwe dirêjî silavê kir.

meaning list.meaning: bi hev re bimînin, bi hev re bimînin
meaning list.sentence: The team managed to hold together through difficult times.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tîm karî di demên dijwar de bi hev re bimîne.

meaning list.sentence: It’s hard to keep up with all the new technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: Zehmet e ku meriv bi hemî teknolojiyên nû re bimîne.

meaning list.meaning: bi tundî rexne bikin an jî êrîş bikin
meaning list.sentence: The teacher laid into the student for not completing the assignment.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mamoste ji ber ku dersên malê nekiriye xwendekar şermezar kir.

meaning list.sentence: The rain didn’t let up all day.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tevahiya rojê baran nehişt.

meaning list.sentence: He didn’t let up until the project was complete.
meaning list.sentence translation: Heya ku proje bi dawî bû, navber negirt.

meaning list.meaning: debara xwe kirin, bi tiştekî jiyan kirin
meaning list.sentence: He lived off his savings for several months.
meaning list.sentence translation: Çend mehan ew bi teserûfa xwe dijî.

meaning list.sentence: He looks down on people who don’t have a degree.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ew li kesên bê derecê biçûk dinêre.

meaning list.sentence: She looked him up and down before speaking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Beriya ku biaxive li ser û jêr mêze kir.

meaning list.sentence: We passed through a small town on our way to the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: Em di nav bajarekî biçûk re diçûn çiyayan.

meaning list.sentence: He passed through the city for a conference.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ji bo konferansekê demeke kurt li bajêr ma.

meaning list.sentence: The media played up the risks of the new technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: Medya metirsiyên teknolojiya nû mezin kirin.

meaning list.sentence: My back has been playing up again.
meaning list.sentence translation: Pişta min dîsa dest bi pirsgirêkan kir.

meaning list.sentence: She popped in to say hello on her way to work.
meaning list.sentence translation: Li ser rêya karê xwe silav jê re rawestiya.

meaning list.meaning: Bi pêş ve diçin, bi biryar berdewam dikin
meaning list.sentence: Despite the challenges, they pushed ahead with their plans.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tevî zehmetiyan jî bi plana xwe pêş de çûn.

meaning list.sentence: Someone ran off with her bag while she wasn’t looking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dema ku ew ne digeriya, yekî çentê wê dizî û reviya.

meaning list.meaning: bi rê ketin, dest bi rêwîtiyê kirin
meaning list.sentence: They set off on their trip early in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: Serê sibê zû dest bi rêwîtiya xwe kirin.

meaning list.sentence: The venue was set up for the wedding reception.
meaning list.sentence translation: Cihê dawetê hat amadekirin.

meaning list.sentence: We had to sit through a very boring lecture.
meaning list.sentence translation: Diviyabû me derseke pir bêzar bikişîne.

meaning list.sentence: True friends will always stick by you.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hevalên rastîn dê her dem ji we re dilsoz bimînin.

meaning list.meaning: Dest bi wextê xwe bi tiştek an kesek re derbas dikin
meaning list.sentence: She took up with a new group of friends after moving to the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Piştî ku çû bajêr, bi komek hevalên xwe re dest bi wextê xwe kir.
